import { Playground, Props } from 'docz'
import LinkWithArrow from './link-with-arrow'

# LinkWithArrow
**SUBCATEGORY:** Navigation

<hr />

## Link with arrow
### Description
For important links, and for linking to related content.

<Playground>
  <LinkWithArrow
    text='Link with arrow'
    href='/'
  />
</Playground>

**Selected**

<Playground>
  <LinkWithArrow
    text='Link with arrow'
    href='/'
    selected
  />
</Playground>

<hr />
